oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Strategic utilization of catalytic metathesis and photo-thermal metathesis in caged polycyclic frames
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
SEEMA, V
SINGH, K
DEODHAR, KD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: olefin cross-metathesis
ring-closing metathesis
nobel lecture
design
model
dodecahedrane
polyquinanes
allylation
molecules
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Highly functionalized cage compounds have been prepared via cross-metathesis (CM) using Grubbs modified N-tolyol catalyst 7. A strategic utilization of photo-thermal metathesis and catalytic metathesis sequence for the synthesis of functionalized caged molecules has been demonstrated.
